title: Continuing Engineering Mathematics Education Design Utilizing Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Instructional design emphasizing graphic-based multimedia content in mobile learning environments utilizing personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can explain engineering math concepts with 90% accuracy using various graphic multimedia types (static/dynamic/non-interactive/VR).
Learners can choose graphic-based learning materials over text-based content with at least 70% higher preference.
Learners can improve their engineering math problem-solving skills by over 80% through simulation tasks provided in a mobile environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
